00019 def help():
00020     return "This is *fem a complete fem suite.\n\nOptions: \
00021                 \n\t-h or --help: show this message; \
00022                 \n\t--version: displays the software version; \
00023                 \n\t--authors: shows the list of the software developers; \
00024                 \n\t--openmodel project_name: open a model; \
00025                 \n\t--solve project_name: if the project is ready the solving process begin; \
00026                 \n\t--check project_name: check if a project is complete and ready to solve; \
00027                 \n\t--batch project_name1 project_name2 ... : batch process solving of multiple models; \
00028                 \n\t--debug [along with any other option]: prints extra warning messages including software internals; \
00029                 \n\t--dependencies: outputs the libraries required for *fem to work;"
00030 
00031 def authors():
00032     return "Petrica TARAS"
00033 
00034 def version():
00035     return "0.0.0a"
00036 
00037 def libraries():
00038     return "List of required Python libraries: \n \
00039             \n\tTkinter - GUI toolkit; \
00040             \n\tnetworkx - graph library; \
00041             \n\tsympy - symbolic computation library;"            
00042 
00043 if __name__ == "__main__":
00044     import sys
00045     if len(sys.argv)==1:
00046         exec(compile(open("./initall.py").read(), "./initall.py", 'exec'))
00047     else: # ufff - better check if these strings are in the sys.argv string list then print them properly. Move the message errors to xml files.
00048         if len(sys.argv)==2:
00049             if sys.argv[1]=="-h" or sys.argv[1]=="--help":
00050                 print(help())
00051             elif sys.argv[1]=="--version":
00052                 print(version())
00053             elif sys.argv[1]=="--authors":
00054                 print(authors())
00055             elif sys.argv[1]=="--dependencies":
00056                 print(libraries())
00057             else:
00058                 print("Unrecognized parameter: Please refer to the available help:\n\n"+help())
00059 else:
00060     pass
